pokemon.name: bulbasaur
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

pokemon.name: ivysaur
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

pokemon.name: venusaur
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The flower on its back catches the sun's rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.

pokemon.name: charmander
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

pokemon.name: charmeleon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Tough fights could excite this POKéMON. When excited, it may blow out bluish- white flames.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

pokemon.name: squirtle
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

pokemon.name: wartortle
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

pokemon.name: blastoise
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.

pokemon.name: caterpie
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.

pokemon.name: metapod
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

pokemon.name: butterfree
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

pokemon.name: weedle
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

pokemon.name: kakuna
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

pokemon.name: beedrill
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It has 3 poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemon.name: pidgey
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

pokemon.name: pidgeotto
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: This POKéMON is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

pokemon.name: pidgeot
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: This POKéMON flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

pokemon.name: rattata
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Will chew on any­ thing with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

pokemon.name: raticate
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

pokemon.name: spearow
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its ter­ ritory.

pokemon.name: fearow
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

pokemon.name: ekans
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

pokemon.name: arbok
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

pokemon.name: pikachu
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

pokemon.name: raichu
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

pokemon.name: sandshrew
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

pokemon.name: sandslash
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

pokemon.name: nidoran-f
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

pokemon.name: nidorina
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

pokemon.name: nidoqueen
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this POKéMON. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

pokemon.name: nidoran-m
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

pokemon.name: nidorino
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.

pokemon.name: nidoking
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

pokemon.name: clefairy
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

pokemon.name: clefable
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.

pokemon.name: vulpix
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

pokemon.name: ninetales
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: jigglypuff
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

pokemon.name: wigglytuff
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

pokemon.name: zubat
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for ob­ jects in its way.

pokemon.name: golbat
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

pokemon.name: oddish
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

pokemon.name: gloom
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose- bending stink.

pokemon.name: vileplume
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Flaps its broad flower petals to scatter its poisonous pollen. The flapping sound is very loud.

pokemon.name: paras
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

pokemon.name: parasect
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

pokemon.name: venonat
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its large eyes act as radars. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

pokemon.name: venomoth
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

pokemon.name: diglett
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It prefers dark places. It spends most of its time underground, though it may pop up in caves.

pokemon.name: dugtrio
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it's an earthquake.

pokemon.name: meowth
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can't stop from picking them up.

pokemon.name: persian
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

pokemon.name: psyduck
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

pokemon.name: golduck
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swim­ ming gracefully in lakes.

pokemon.name: mankey
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: An agile POKéMON that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

pokemon.name: primeape
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

pokemon.name: growlithe
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A POKéMON with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

pokemon.name: arcanine
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A legendary POKé­ MON in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

pokemon.name: poliwag
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

pokemon.name: poliwhirl
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Under attack, it uses its belly  spiral to put the foe to sleep. It then makes its escape.

pokemon.name: poliwrath
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.

pokemon.name: abra
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

pokemon.name: kadabra
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Many odd things happen if this POKéMON is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backwards.

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A POKéMON that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns-- that's why this POKéMON is smart.

pokemon.name: machop
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.

pokemon.name: machoke
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.

pokemon.name: bellsprout
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

pokemon.name: weepinbell
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

pokemon.name: victreebel
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day, bones and all.

pokemon.name: tentacool
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.

pokemon.name: tentacruel
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

pokemon.name: geodude
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Commonly found near mountain trails, etc. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

pokemon.name: graveler
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

pokemon.name: golem
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

pokemon.name: ponyta
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.

pokemon.name: rapidash
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Just loves to run. If it sees some­ thing faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.

pokemon.name: slowpoke
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Lives lazily by the sea. If the SHELLDER on its tail comes off, it becomes a SLOWPOKE again.

pokemon.name: magnemite
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electro­ magnetic waves.

pokemon.name: magneton
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the tem­ perature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

pokemon.name: farfetchd
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.

pokemon.name: doduo
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its short wings make flying dif­ ficult. Instead, this POKéMON runs at high speed on developed legs.

pokemon.name: dodrio
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: One of DODUO's 2 heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 MPH in prairies.

pokemon.name: seel
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Loves freezing cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid cli­ mate of around 14F degrees.

pokemon.name: dewgong
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

pokemon.name: grimer
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Made of hardened sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won't grow in its path.

pokemon.name: muk
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.

pokemon.name: shellder
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.

pokemon.name: cloyster
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: For protection, it uses its harder- than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

pokemon.name: gastly
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.

pokemon.name: haunter
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.

pokemon.name: gengar
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

pokemon.name: onix
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.

pokemon.name: drowzee
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

pokemon.name: hypno
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

pokemon.name: krabby
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

pokemon.name: kingler
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.

pokemon.name: voltorb
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It is said to camouflage itself as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

pokemon.name: electrode
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

pokemon.name: exeggcute
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.

pokemon.name: exeggutor
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

pokemon.name: cubone
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

pokemon.name: marowak
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Small and weak, this POKéMON is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.

pokemon.name: hitmonlee
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on im­ pact and destroys its enemy.

pokemon.name: hitmonchan
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Punches in cork­ screw fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall in the same way as a drill.

pokemon.name: lickitung
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

pokemon.name: koffing
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!

pokemon.name: weezing
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

pokemon.name: rhyhorn
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A POKéMON with a one-track mind. Once it charges,  it won't stop running until it falls asleep.

pokemon.name: rhydon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.

pokemon.name: chansey
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A gentle and kind­ hearted POKéMON that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured POKéMON.

pokemon.name: tangela
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

pokemon.name: kangaskhan
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.

pokemon.name: horsea
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: If it senses any danger, it will vigorously spray water or a special type of ink from its mouth.

pokemon.name: seadra
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Touching the back fin causes numb­ ness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

pokemon.name: goldeen
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

pokemon.name: seaking
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It is the male's job to make a nest by carving out boulders in a stream using the horn on its head.

pokemon.name: staryu
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: As long as the center section is unharmed, it can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.

pokemon.name: starmie
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.

pokemon.name: mr-mime
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Always practices its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn't.

pokemon.name: scyther
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Leaps out of tall grass and slices prey with its scythes. The move­ ment looks like that of a ninja.

pokemon.name: jynx
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.

pokemon.name: electabuzz
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this POKéMON has eaten electricity at a power plant.

pokemon.name: magmar
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.

pokemon.name: pinsir
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can't move if it's cold, so it lives in warm places.

pokemon.name: tauros
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A rowdy POKéMON with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won't stop until it hits something.

pokemon.name: magikarp
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

pokemon.name: gyarados
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

pokemon.name: ditto
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its oppo­ nent.

pokemon.name: eevee
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.

pokemon.name: vaporeon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It will melt away and become invis­ ible in water.

pokemon.name: jolteon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A sensitive POKé­ MON that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

pokemon.name: flareon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then blows out fire that is over 3,000F degrees.

pokemon.name: porygon
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The only POKéMON people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

pokemon.name: omanyte
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: An ancient POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It swims by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

pokemon.name: omastar
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Sharp beaks ring its mouth. Its shell was too big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.

pokemon.name: kabuto
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It uses the eyes on its back while hiding on the sea floor.

pokemon.name: kabutops
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A slim and fast swimmer. It slices its prey with its sharp sickles and drinks the body fluids.

pokemon.name: aerodactyl
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A savage POKéMON that died out in ancient times. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.

pokemon.name: snorlax
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.

pokemon.name: articuno
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A legendary bird POKéMON. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

pokemon.name: zapdos
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to appear when the sky turns dark and lightning showers down.

pokemon.name: moltres
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: A legendary bird POKéMON. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

pokemon.name: dratini
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: The existence of this mythical POKéMON was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.

pokemon.name: dragonair
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: According to a witness, its body was surrounded by a strange aura that gave it a mystical look.

pokemon.name: dragonite
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: It is said that this POKéMON lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

pokemon.name: mewtwo
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: Its DNA is almost the same as MEW's. However, its size and disposition are vastly dif­ ferent.

pokemon.name: mew
pokemon.flavor_text_yellow: When viewed through a micro­ scope, this POKéMON's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
